about_the_game:
Are you worried about looking less than impressive while defending your homeland from the forces of capitalist imperialism? This pack is guaranteed to have you shouting 'Our homes are safe!'.

Provides instant access to selected items normally accessed via leveling up for the NLF and PAVN.

  • Warm Vest
  • Medium Hair
  • Spectacles
  • Shades
  • Ho Chi Minh Goatee
  • Crocodile Tattoo
  • Dong Song Tattoo
  • Dragon Tattoo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.5GHz or AMD Phenom @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: UNSUPPORTED HARDWARE: 32-bit Operating Systems
